quetions.question: 1. Wabonye gute muri rusangi iyi reresi ?(hitamwo kimwe)
answers: Nayikunze kandi yari ngira kamaro
Ntaho mpagaze kandi nibaza ko vyoba vyari ngira kamaro canke atari ngira kamaro
Sinahimbawe n'iyi reresi kandi nibaza ko itari ngira kamaro

quetions.question: 2. Ni ubuhe bushobozi buri muri ino reresi? (hitamwo inyishu imwe ibereye)
answers: kwubaka ubwonko bwawe
kutadohoka
kugenzura inyiyumvo zawe

quetions.question: 3. Ni iyihe ntumbero y'agakorwa? (hitamwo inyishu imwe ibereye)
answers: Gufasha abanyeshure kumenya intambuko bategerezwa gufata kugira bashike ku mahangiro yabo.
Gufasha abanyeshure gushira ku muzirikanyi no kwibuka ivyo bize.
Gufasha abanyeshure kwiga gukorera mu mugwi no guhanahana ivyiyumviro umwe n'uwundi.

quetions.question: 4. Ni ibihe imigwi y'abanyeshure itegerezwa gufata nka nkama muri kano gakorwa? hitamwo inyishu imwe ibereye)
answers: Urutonde rw'ibishobisho vyanditswe ku rubaho.
Ibibazo vyo kubazanya mu gihe hari ikiganiro
Urukurikirane rw'ibikorwa vyakozwe n'umwigisha

quetions.question: 5. Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora? (hitamwo inyishu imwe ibereye)
answers: Notegerezwa guhindura umurwi watanguye ubwa mbere ku muzunguruko uwo ariwo wose kugira ngo imigwi yose igire amahirwe yo kuba iya mbere, iya kari iya gatatu canke ubwa nyuma.
Notegerezwa kubwira abanyeshure urutonde mu gihe batavyibuka bonyene ubwabo
Notegerezwa kuraba ko abanyeshure bose bimenyereje ku mwanya umwe

quetions.question: 6. Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora? (hitamwo inyishu imwe ibereye)
answers: Notegerezwa gukarira abanyeshure
Notegerezwa kukagumisha mu kwongeramwo ibikorwa vyinshi canke kugenda nihutisha ibikorwa
Notegerezwa guhata abanyeshure kwishura inyishu zibereye

quetions.question: 7. Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora? (hitamwo inyishu imwe ibereye)
answers: Notegerezwa gusaba abanyeshure bakuze gusubiramwo ibikorwa basubira inyuma canke ngasaba umugwi uwo ariwo wose kwongeramwo igikorwa mu rukurikirane rw'ibikorwa kugira ngo uwundi mugwi uvyibuke
Notegerezwa gukora ibikorwa vyinshi mu rukurikirane rw'abana bato
Notegerezwa kubasigurira amategeko gusa sindabereke uko bikorwa

quetions.question: 8. Ni akahe karore k'ikibazo wobaza abanyeshure bawe mu mwanya w'ikiganiro c'aka gakorwa hitamwo inyishu imwe ibereye)
answers: Ni gute woshobora gukorera mu runani hamwe n'abandi mu buzima bwa misi yose?
Ni ubuhe buhinga wakoresheje bwagufashije kwibuka ibikorwa n'urutonde?
Ni ubuhe bumenyi wakoresheje mu kugenzura ibishobisho vyawe?

quetions.question: 9. Wokora iki mu gihe abanyeshure bawe badakoze neza ako gakorwa mu mwanya wa mbere bimenyereje ? (hitamwo inyishu imwe ibereye)
answers: Notegerezwa kwongeramwo ibikorwa vyinshi mu rukurikirane rwanje kugera abanyeshure batahuye
Notegerezwa guhagarika igikorwa no kutongera kugakina kandi
Notegerezwa gutangura kwimenyereza n'igitigiri gito mu rukurikirane rwanje kandi nkimenyereza agakorwa imisi yose

quetions.question: 10. Wagize neza kuza kwiga ubifashijwemwo n'umumenyereza gaciyubwenge uwu musi. Ni gute wipfuza kwimenyereza izi nyigisho z'ibishobisho mu ndwi iza ? Ihangiro ryawe ritegerezwa kuba: Nyezina, ku mwanya kandi rishikwako. Vugana ihangiro ryawe n'abagenzi bawe. Andika ihangiro ryawe ku gahimba gato k'urupapuro, hanyuma ndagahe icegera c'umuyobozi.

I am neutral and I think it was neither useful nor useless.
I did not enjoy the video and I thought it was not useful.
